context: NetApp, Inc. is a data management and storage company focused on enterprise storage, cloud data services, and hybrid cloud. NAS storage leader. Filer appliances for enterprises.

competitors.name: Auspex Systems
competitors.notes: NetApp's major competitor when the company was founded in 1992, competed in the NAS market

competitors.name: EMC Corporation
competitors.notes: Dominant enterprise storage vendor with SAN and emerging NAS solutions

competitors.name: Network Appliance (early competitors)
competitors.notes: Competed against traditional storage array vendors entering the NAS space

competitors.name: Sun Microsystems
competitors.notes: Provided file servers and storage systems
